v-model:popup-visible.description: Whether the pop-up box is visible

default-popup-visible.description: Whether the pop-up box is visible by default (uncontrolled mode)
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 弹出框默认是否可见（非受控模式）

:popup-offset.description: The offset of the popup (the offset distance of the popover from the trigger)
:popup-offset.description_zh: 弹出框的偏移量（弹出框距离触发器的偏移距离）

:popup-translate.description: The distance the pop-up box moves

show-arrow.description: Whether or not the pop-up box displays an arrow

align-point.description: Whether the pop-up follows the mouse

popup-hover-stay.description: Whether to keep the pop-up displayed when the trigger is moved out and moved in
popup-hover-stay.description_zh: 是否在移出触发器，并移入弹出框时保持弹出框显示

blur-to-close.description: Whether to close the pop-up box when the trigger loses focus
blur-to-close.description_zh: 是否在触发器失去焦点时关闭弹出框

click-to-close.description: Whether to close the pop-up box when the trigger is clicked
click-to-close.description_zh: 是否在点击触发器时关闭弹出框

click-outside-to-close.description: Whether to close the pop-up box when you click on the external area
click-outside-to-close.description_zh: 是否在点击外部区域时关闭弹出框

unmount-on-close.description: Whether to uninstall the pop-up node when it is closed
unmount-on-close.description_zh: 是否在关闭时卸载弹出框节点

content-class.description: The class name of the pop-up contents

:content-style.description: The style of the popover content

arrow-class.description: The class name of the pop-up arrow

:arrow-style.description: The style of the popover arrows

:popup-style.description: The style of the pop-up box

animation-name.description: The name of the pop-up animation

duration.description: The duration of the pop-up animation

:mouse-enter-delay.description: Time for mouseenter event delay to trigger (ms)
:mouse-enter-delay.description_zh: mouseenter事件延时触发的时间（毫秒）

:mouse-leave-delay.description: Time for the mouseleave event to be delayed (ms)
:mouse-leave-delay.description_zh: mouseleave事件延时触发的时间（毫秒）

:focus-delay.description: Time for the focus event to be triggered by a delay (ms)
:focus-delay.description_zh: focus事件延时触发的时间（毫秒）

auto-fit-popup-width.description: Whether to set the pop-up width to the trigger width
auto-fit-popup-width.description_zh: 是否将弹出框宽度设置为触发器宽度

auto-fit-popup-min-width.description: Whether to set the minimum width of the pop-up box to the trigger width
auto-fit-popup-min-width.description_zh: 是否将弹出框的最小宽度设置为触发器宽度

auto-fix-position.description: When the size of the trigger changes, whether to recalculate the pop-up box position
auto-fix-position.description_zh: 当触发器的尺寸发生变化时，是否重新计算弹出框位置

update-at-scroll.description: Whether to update the position of the popover box when the container scrolls
update-at-scroll.description_zh: 是否在容器滚动时更新弹出框的位置

auto-fit-position.description: Whether to automatically adjust the pop-up box position to fit the window size
auto-fit-position.description_zh: 是否自动调整弹出框位置，以适应窗口大小

render-to-body.description: Whether it is mounted under the body element
render-to-body.description_zh: 是否挂载在 body 元素下

prevent-focus.description: Whether to prevent elements in the pop-up layer from gaining focus when clicked
prevent-focus.description_zh: 是否阻止弹出层中的元素点击时获取焦点

scroll-to-close.description: Whether to close the pop-up box while scrolling
scroll-to-close.description_zh: 是否在滚动时关闭弹出框

:scroll-to-close-distance.description: Scroll threshold, which triggers a shutdown when the scroll distance exceeds this value
:scroll-to-close-distance.description_zh: 滚动阈值，当滚动距离超过该值时触发关闭

events.name: popup-visible-change
events.description: A pop-up box is displayed when the status changes
events.description_zh: 弹出框显示状态改变时触发

events.name: show
events.description: Triggered after the pop-up box is displayed (at the end of the animation).
events.description_zh: 弹出框显示后（动画结束）触发

events.name: hide
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up box is hidden (at the end of the animation).
events.description_zh: 弹出框隐藏后（动画结束）触发
